get.summary: Get information about a account

get.summary: Get feeds list a account posted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Account Identifier.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filters feeds which started on since or later.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of feeds. By default the value is 0.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of feeds returned on one result page. By default the value is 20 entries. The page size can never be larger than 50.

parameters.description: Filters friend requests which you have received or sent.

get.summary: Health checking

scopes.messages: to post and delete messages on a user's behalf
scopes.feed_likes: to like and unlike feed on a user’s behalf
scopes.follower_list: to read the list of followers and followed-by users
scopes.groups: to create and delete groups on a user's behalf
scopes.relationships: to following and unfollow accounts on a user’s behalf
scopes.reports: to report account, feed, group and comment on a user’s behalf
scopes.group_invitations: to create, delete, accept and reject invitations on a user's behalf
scopes.media: to create and delete media on a user’s behalf
scopes.comment_likes: to like and unlike comment on a user’s behalf
scopes.basic: to read a user’s profile info and media
scopes.friend_requests: to create and delete friend request on a user’s behalf
scopes.feeds: to post and delete feeds on a user’s behalf
scopes.comments: to post and delete comments on a user’s behalf

displayName.description: Display name that each account shown.

message.description: A feed message will be posted.
A feed message will be posted.

byInvitationOnly.description: Only invited accounts can join in.

authorityType.description: Which accounts can manage a group.

byInvitationOnly.description: Only invited accounts can join in.

authorityType.description: Which accounts can manage a group.
